title: BYND Cannasoft Enterprises Inc.

title: The Gong!
message: BYND Cannasoft Enterprises begins trading on the Canadian Securities Exchange under the symbol CSE:BYND

title: What, why, who and where?
message: Our COO, Yiftah Ben Yaackov, gives some important answers about our company on CSE TV
